attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament immediately and call a general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to put an end to the political chaos created by the events of the last few months, culminating in the expenses scandal, the only way we can restore confidence in parliament is for the people to vote on which members deserve to represent them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
